attributes.action: Ban the import of pork products that do not meet the same welfare standards expected of British farmers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British pork farmers have to conform to higher welfare standards for their pigs than their EU counterparts. This means British pork costs more to produce and cannot compete with cheaper EU pork. 

It is unfair that our British Pork Farmers are told they have to produce pork to stricter welfare policies, and yet still have to compete with cheaper Pork produced in countries with lower welfare policies.

It is an unfair playing field and it's killing our Pork industry.  

Until the foreign Pork farmers meet the same standards as British Pork farmers, the UK should not be importing their Pork!
